short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters fantasy books on Goodreads based on specific criteria.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Built to help filter down to the books & series you want to read.

By default, it filters out books that are mid-series (i.e. it will only show book #1, but filter out book #2, #3, etc).  

In addition, it has adjustable filters for:
- Minimum star rating (default 4)
- Minimum number of ratings (default 300)
- Year published (default 2010)

It only works on the Recommendations and Shelves page (i.e. "https://www.goodreads.com/shelf/show/fantasy")
